attributes.action: Check the circumstances of the 20% tax starting April 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From April 2008 my tax bill will double being on a low income £7500 pa my tax will rise from £18.62 per month to £38+ completely negating two small pay rises for 2007 and 2008,there must be many many more in the same situation!
